summary:
This mod brings any archer his true archers focus.
Trigger your mind and focus on the power of the bow.
Use your skills to tactically set course with spells
that apply to archers only.
descriptionHtml:
[h1]NEWS FLASH: I\'ll be on a skieing trip from February 15th till February 24th![/h1]

[b]The \"Mind\" series currently include:[/b]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=118250193]A Blood Benders Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=123027495]A Keen Markmans Mind[/url]


This mod brings any archer his true archers focus.
Trigger your mind and focus on the power of the bow.
Use your skills to tactically set course with spells
that apply to archers only.

All spellbooks are found at \"Northwind Summit\"
(Console: coc dragonlair06exterior02)

[b]BASE SPELLS:[/b]
[b]Mindstate: Trigger Fingers[/b]
Conjure a extremely powerful bow for 10 seconds based on your current 
archery level and unlock a special bow once you reach level 70.

[b]Focus: Absorb Archery Knowledge[/b]
Absorbs archery knowledge from anyone within a specific range for 
two minutes. Increasing your hit damage.

[b]Focus: Fortify Followers Archery[/b]
Boosts your followers archery skill by 30 points for 2 minutes.


[b]PERK TREE ADDONS:[/b]
[b]Eagle Eye[/b]
This adds another rank to the Eagle eye perk, allowing you 
to zoom in even further.

[b]Steady Hands[/b]
This adds another rank to the Steady Hands perk, allowing 
time to slow down even more.

[b]THE LEVEL SYSTEM:[/b]
[b]Archery level needed to spawn a certain bow:[/b]
* Lvl 0 - 5: Hunting Bow
* Lvl 6 - 11: Orcish Bow
* Lvl 12 - 18: Dwarven Bow
* Lvl 19 - 26: Elven Bow
* Lvl 27 - 35: Glass Bow
* Lvl 36 - 45: Ebony Bow
* Lvl 46 - 69: Daedric Bow
* Lvl 70 - Max: Bow Of Focus

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]Skype:[/b] Dyramisty
[b]Facebook:[/b] [url=http://www.facebook.com/ddeheer]Dylan de Heer[/url]

[b]Skyrim Nexus:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1384870]Dyramisty[/url]

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]CHANGELOG:[/b] 
V1.0:
* Release

V2.0:
* Each bow now has it\'s own bound arrow
* Bow Of Focus has been added as a non bound version too. Find it next to the Spell books.
* Fixed bug where you could use the spell while the effect still lasted of the last use.

V2.1:
* Fixed the bug where the normal version of the \"Bow Of Focus\" would dissapear after unequipping it.
author: Dyramisty
